mapper.select: SELECT tb_order_info.order_id as orderId, tb_order_info.init_time as initTime, tb_order_info.customer_number as customerNumber, tb_order_pool.order_status as orderStatus, tb_order_pool.remark FROM tb_order_info, tb_order_pool WHERE tb_order_pool.is_deleted=0 and tb_order_info.order_id = tb_order_pool.order_id;
